comments.body: During the last presidential election, if you have followed Peter Obi sequently, he talked more about, from consumption to production.The reason why he was emphasizing on that is that, local production of goods, gives value to your currency and it helps to boost the GDP of your country.Another thing way dey kill us as a people na politics, because politics brings insincerity, ethnicity and high level of greed.So until we begin to conscientize our people about growing a strong economic capital base locally, we won't get that recognition and respect that we deserve.Normally when oil price fall for international market, e no suppose to be a threat to us, because we for don get other sources of revenue way dey generate money for us, like agriculture and other industrial and business hubs way dey bring money come. Just look at the landmark of Niger state, just imagine if that large extent of land, can be used for agricultural purpose, by now the story line would have been different.
